name: International Business Machines Corporation
summary: International Business Machines Corporation (IBM) is a global leader in technology and consulting, headquartered in Armonk, New York. Founded in 1911, IBM operates in over 170 countries, providing integrated solutions in cloud computing, artificial intelligence, IT infrastructure, and consulting services. IBM is renowned for its innovation, extensive patent portfolio, and contributions to computing history, including mainframes, quantum computing, and AI.
